properties.name: driveId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: folderId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: title
properties.description: The ID in the document URL (or just paste the whole URL)

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data

properties.name: actionsUi
properties.description: Actions applied to update the document

properties.name: insertSegment
properties.description: The update action

properties.name: segmentId
properties.description: The ID of the header, footer or footnote. The Document â†’ Get operation lists all segment IDs (make sure you disable the simple toggle).

properties.name: startIndex
properties.description: The zero-based start index of this range

properties.name: endIndex
properties.description: The zero-based end index of this range

properties.name: Checkbox List
properties.description: A bulleted list with CHECKBOX bullet glyphs for all list nesting levels

properties.name: Numbered List
properties.description: A numbered list with DECIMAL numeric glyphs separated by periods, where each nesting level uses the previous nesting level's glyph as a prefix. For example: 1., 1.1., 2., 2.2 .

properties.name: footerId
properties.description: The ID of the footer to delete. To retrieve it, use the get document where you can find under footers attribute.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The ID of the range

properties.name: index
properties.description: The zero-based index, relative to the beginning of the specified segment

properties.name: rows
properties.description: The number of rows in the table

properties.name: columns
properties.description: The number of columns in the table

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to insert in the document

properties.name: replaceText
properties.description: The text that will replace the matched text

properties.name: matchCase
properties.description: Whether the search should respect case sensitivity

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.description: The zero-based row index

properties.name: columnIndex
properties.description: The zero-based column index

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: Apply changes to the latest revision. Otherwise changes will not be processed.

properties.name: Required
properties.description: Apply changes to the provided revision while incorporating other collaborators' changes. This mode is used for the recent revision, Otherwise changes will not be processed.
